text: is a train and tram station in Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture, Japan. It is on the Takahama Line and Ōtemachi Line, both operated by Iyotetsu. During most of the day, railway trains arrive every fifteen minutes. Trains continue from Matsuyama City Station on the Yokogawara Line to Yokogawara Station. At this station, the Takahama Line and Ōtemachi Liine cross each other, forming a level junction. This is the only example of a right angle level junction in Japan. ==Lines== * Iyotetsu ** Takahama Line (railway) ** Ōtemachi Line (tram) ==Adjacent stations== |- !colspan=5|Iyotetsu ==References== Category:Iyotetsu Takahama Line Category:Railway stations in Ehime Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1927
title: Ōtemachi Station (Ehime)
